trans-unit.source: Represents the security policy levels for the common language runtime.
This class cannot be inherited.
Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the common language runtime (CLR) is moving away from providing security policy for computers.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 不再提供安全策略的计算机。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you use [Windows Software Restriction Policies (SRP)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178101) or [AppLocker](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178102) as a replacement for CLR security policy.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你使用[Windows 软件限制策略 (SRP)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178101)或[AppLocker](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178102)作为 CLR 安全策略的替换。

trans-unit.source: The information in this topic applies to the .NET Framework version 3.5 and earlier; it does not apply to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] and later.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中的信息适用于.NET Framework 版本 3.5 及更早版本;它不适用于[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]及更高版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this and other changes, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关此更改以及其他更改的详细信息，请参阅[安全更改](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The highest level of security policy is enterprise-wide.
trans-unit.target: 安全策略的最高级别是企业范围。

trans-unit.source: Successive lower levels of hierarchy represent further policy restrictions, but can never grant more permissions than allowed by higher levels.
trans-unit.target: 连续较低级别的层次结构表示更多的策略限制，但永远不会授予比允许的更高级别的权限。

trans-unit.source: The following policy levels are implemented:
trans-unit.target: 实现以下策略级别：

trans-unit.source: Enterprise: Security policy for all managed code in an enterprise.
trans-unit.target: Enterprise： 在企业中的所有托管代码的安全策略。

trans-unit.source: Machine: Security policy for all managed code run on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 计算机： 在计算机上运行的所有托管代码的安全策略。

trans-unit.source: User: Security policy for all managed code run by the user.
trans-unit.target: 由用户运行的所有托管代码的用户： 安全策略。

trans-unit.source: Application domain: Security policy for all managed code in an application.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序域： 应用程序中的所有托管代码的安全策略。

trans-unit.source: A policy level consists of a set of code groups organized into a single rooted tree (see <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup>), a set of named permission sets that are referenced by the code groups to specify permissions to be granted to code belonging to the code group, and a list of fully-trusted assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 策略级别均包含一组的组织到取得 root 权限的单个树的代码组 (请参阅<xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup>)、 一组指定要对代码组所属的代码可授予权限的代码组引用的命名的权限集和的列表完全信任程序集。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.SecurityManager.PolicyHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to enumerate the policy levels.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.SecurityManager.PolicyHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>要枚举的策略级别。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> to the list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> objects used to determine whether an assembly is a member of the group of assemblies that should not be evaluated.

The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> used to create the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> to add to the list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> objects used to determine whether an assembly is a member of the group of assemblies that should not be evaluated.

Adds a <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> corresponding to the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> to the list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> objects used to determine whether an assembly is a member of the group of assemblies that should not be evaluated.

The <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.AddFullTrustAssembly%2A> method is not supported in version 2.0 or later of the .NET Framework because the list of full trust assemblies is not used in those versions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.AddFullTrustAssembly%2A>方法不支持在版本 2.0 或更高版本的.NET framework 中，因为这些版本中不使用完全信任程序集的列表。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sn" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> specified by the <paramref name="sn" /> parameter already has full trust.

The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> to add to the list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> objects used to determine whether an assembly is a member of the group of assemblies that should not be evaluated.

Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> to the list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> objects used to determine whether an assembly is a member of the group of assemblies that should not be evaluated.

The <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.AddFullTrustAssembly%2A> method is not supported in version 2.0 or later of the .NET Framework because the list of full trust assemblies is not used in those versions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.AddFullTrustAssembly%2A>方法不支持在版本 2.0 或更高版本的.NET framework 中，因为这些版本中不使用完全信任程序集的列表。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="snMC" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> specified by the <paramref name="snMC" /> parameter already has full trust.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> to add to the current policy level.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> to the current policy level.
Named permission sets are scoped by policy level.
trans-unit.target: 策略级别的范围内命名的权限集。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="permSet" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="permSet" /> parameter has the same name as an existing <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" />.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> to replace.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> that replaces the <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> specified by the <c>name</c> parameter.
Replaces a <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> in the current policy level with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" />.
A copy of the <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> that was replaced.
The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
The <paramref name="pSet" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is equal to the name of a reserved permission set.
-or-
The <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> specified by the <paramref name="pSet" /> parameter cannot be found.
Creates a new policy level for use at the application domain policy level.
The newly created <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" />.
This method creates a new <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel> with the <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.Label%2A> "AppDomain".
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建一个新<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel>与<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.Label%2A>"AppDomain"。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel> will initially contain the same <xref:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet> objects as in the default computer policy, and will have a single root code group that grants `FullTrust` to all code.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel>最初包含相同<xref:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet>如下所示的默认计算机策略和将对象具有授予的单个根代码组`FullTrust`于的所有代码。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
Reconstructs a security object with a given state from an XML encoding.
The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> specified by the <paramref name="e" /> parameter is invalid.

Gets a list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> objects used to determine whether an assembly is a member of the group of assemblies used to evaluate security policy.
A list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> objects used to determine whether an assembly is a member of the group of assemblies used to evaluate security policy.
trans-unit.target: 一份<see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" />对象用于确定程序集是否为程序集用于评估安全策略的组的成员。

trans-unit.source: These assemblies are granted full trust during security policy evaluation of assemblies not in the list.
trans-unit.target: 这些程序集的程序集不在列表中的安全策略评估过程授予完全信任。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.FullTrustAssemblies%2A> are granted full trust during security policy evaluation of assemblies not in the list, but are not automatically granted full trust when directly evaluated by the security policy system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.FullTrustAssemblies%2A> 被授予的完全信任的程序集的安全策略评估期间未显示在列表中，但不是会自动授予完全信任时直接通过安全策略系统计算。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.FullTrustAssemblies%2A> property is not supported in version 2.0 or later of the .NET Framework because the list of full trust assemblies is not used in those versions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.FullTrustAssemblies%2A>属性不支持在版本 2.0 或更高版本的.NET framework 中，因为这些版本中不使用完全信任程序集的列表。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> to find.
Returns the <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> in the current policy level with the specified name.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> in the current policy level with the specified name, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
Gets a descriptive label for the policy level.
The label associated with the policy level.
trans-unit.target: 与策略级别关联的标签。

trans-unit.source: The label is used to help the administrator identify the policy level.
trans-unit.target: 标签用于帮助管理员识别的策略级别。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of named permission sets defined for the policy level.
A list of named permission sets defined for the policy level.
trans-unit.target: 为策略级别定义的命名的权限集的列表。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the configuration file for this <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> with the last backup (reflecting the state of policy prior to the last time it was saved) and returns it to the state of the last save.
This method does not make modifications to the current <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会进行修改当前<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel>。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it updates the <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel> object's file and the <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel> that the security system uses to evaluate policy.
trans-unit.target: 相反，它更新<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel>对象的文件和<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel>安全系统用来评估策略。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the caspol -recover option (see [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)).
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 caspol-恢复选项 (请参阅[Caspol.exe （代码访问安全策略工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md))。

trans-unit.source: The policy level does not have a valid configuration file.
Removes an assembly from the list of assemblies the policy level uses to evaluate policy.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> of the assembly to remove from the list of assemblies used to evaluate policy.
Removes an assembly with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> from the list of assemblies the policy level uses to evaluate policy.

The <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.RemoveFullTrustAssembly%2A> method is not supported in version 2.0 or later of the .NET Framework because the list of full trust assemblies is not used in those versions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.RemoveFullTrustAssembly%2A>方法不支持在版本 2.0 或更高版本的.NET framework 中，因为这些版本中不使用完全信任程序集的列表。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sn" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The assembly with the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongName" /> specified by the <paramref name="sn" /> parameter does not have full trust.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> of the assembly to remove from the list of assemblies used to evaluate policy.
Removes an assembly with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> from the list of assemblies the policy level uses to evaluate policy.

The <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.RemoveFullTrustAssembly%2A> method is not supported in version 2.0 or later of the .NET Framework because the list of full trust assemblies is not used in those versions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.RemoveFullTrustAssembly%2A>方法不支持在版本 2.0 或更高版本的.NET framework 中，因为这些版本中不使用完全信任程序集的列表。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="snMC" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.StrongNameMembershipCondition" /> specified by the <paramref name="snMC" /> parameter does not have full trust.
Removes a <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> from the current policy level.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> to remove from the current policy level.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> from the current policy level.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> that was removed.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> specified by the <paramref name="permSet" /> parameter was not found.
The <paramref name="permSet" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> to remove.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> with the specified name from the current policy level.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> that was removed.
The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is equal to the name of a reserved permission set.
-or-
A <see cref="T:System.Security.NamedPermissionSet" /> with the specified name cannot be found.
The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
Returns the current policy level to the default state.
The default state is different for each policy level.
trans-unit.target: 默认状态是不同的每个策略级别。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> used to resolve the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" />.
Resolves policy based on evidence for the policy level, and returns the resulting <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement" />.
The resulting <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement" />.
<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.Resolve%2A> is the basic policy evaluation operation for policy levels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.Resolve%2A> 是策略级别的基本策略求值运算。

trans-unit.source: Given a set of evidence as input, this method tests membership conditions of code groups starting at the root and working down as matched.
trans-unit.target: 给定一组作为输入的证据，则此方法将测试从根目录开始并匹配下正常工作的代码组的成员资格条件。

trans-unit.source: The combination of permissions resulting from the matching code groups produces a <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement> that is returned.
trans-unit.target: 匹配的代码中得到的权限组合组生成<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement>返回。

trans-unit.source: In granting permissions to code, security policy uses the resolved policy statements for all applicable policy levels, together with the code request for permissions.
trans-unit.target: 在向代码授予权限，安全策略使用所有合适的策略级别，以及代码的权限请求的解决的策略语句。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.Resolve%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel>类。

trans-unit.source: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.
The <paramref name="evidence" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> used to resolve policy.
Resolves policy at the policy level and returns the root of a code group tree that matches the evidence.
A <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup" /> representing the root of a tree of code groups matching the specified evidence.
You can use this method to analyze the effect of the code groups in a policy level with respect to a certain set of evidence.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于分析的证据集与策略级别中的代码组的效果。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the security policy is not granting an assembly the minimum code request permissions it needs, it can be difficult to tell by examination of the code groups exactly where the problem is.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果安全策略不授予程序集所需的最小代码请求权限，它很难通过检查问题处于的确切位置的代码组来判断。

trans-unit.source: Since this method returns a code group that can have child code groups, it is possible for an administrator to examine the code group and its child code groups and determine which code groups match.
trans-unit.target: 由于此方法返回时可以有子代码组的代码组，它时，管理员可以检查的代码组和它的子代码组，并确定哪些代码组匹配。

trans-unit.source: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.
The <paramref name="evidence" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets the root code group for the policy level.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup" /> that is the root of the tree of policy level code groups.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup" />即策略级别的代码组的树的根。

trans-unit.source: Every policy level has one root <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 每个策略级别都有一个根<xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup>。

trans-unit.source: The value for <see cref="P:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel.RootCodeGroup" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets the path where the policy file is stored.
The path where the policy file is stored, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> does not have a storage location.
trans-unit.target: 策略文件的存储位置路径或<see langword="null" />如果<see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" />没有存储位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to display the store location for a policy level.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何显示策略级别的存储位置。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel>类。

trans-unit.source: for ability to manipulate the principal object.
trans-unit.target: 有关操作的主体对象的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
Gets the type of the policy level.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.PolicyLevelType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.PolicyLevelType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The highest level of security policy is enterprise-wide.
trans-unit.target: 安全策略的最高级别是企业范围。

trans-unit.source: Successive lower levels of hierarchy represent further policy restrictions, but can never grant more permissions than allowed by higher levels.
trans-unit.target: 连续较低级别的层次结构表示更多的策略限制，但永远不会授予比允许的更高级别的权限。

trans-unit.source: The policy levels in order are the following.
trans-unit.target: 按顺序的策略级别如下所示。

trans-unit.source: Enterprise
trans-unit.target: 企业

trans-unit.source: Machine
trans-unit.target: 计算机

trans-unit.source: User
trans-unit.target: “用户”

trans-unit.source: Application domain
trans-unit.target: 应用程序域

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Security.PolicyLevelType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Security.PolicyLevelType>。
